item.title: Orion Security emerges from stealth using LLMs to track your enterprise’s data flow and stop it from leaking out
item.description: Beyond catching malicious insiders, Orion also distinguishes between human errors and external attackers for specificity.

item.title: Halliday raises $20 million to build AI agents that operate safely on blockchain
item.description: Halliday secures $20 million to develop secure AI agents for blockchain, solving critical safety challenges for enterprise applications with immutable...

item.title: Muse unveils wearable that combines brainwave tracking and brain oxygen measurements
item.description: Muse by Interaxon, a neurotechnology startup, unveiled Muse S Athena, a consumer wearable that can deliver advanced cognitive fitness insights.

item.title: Minecraft Education launches replica of St. Peter’s Basilica in the Vatican
item.description: Students can step inside this legendary St. Peter's Basilica building and take on the role of its caretakers in Minecraft Education.

item.title: Operative Games unveils AI-driven interactive storytelling platform
item.description: Operative Games, an interactive storytelling company, emerged today from stealth with backing from investors 1AM Gaming, Samsung Next, and LongJourney...
